name: ADAPALENE
breadcrumbs: Topical retinoids and related preparations for acne
cautions:
Cautions 
(From Topical retinoids and related preparations for acne: British National Formulary)
Topical retinoids and related preparations for acne
doses:
adult and child over 12 years, apply thinly once daily in the
evening
pregnancy:
Pregnancy 
(From Topical retinoids and related preparations for acne: British National Formulary)
Pregnancy Topical retinoids are contra-indicated in pregnancy; women of child-bearing age must use effective contraception (oral progestogen-only contraceptives not considered effective).
